name: Robot's Deceleration
description:
This is a generic first-person shooter game made with Unity Engine for Lone Rabbit's Game jam "a jam about time."   This game has 5 to 20 minutes of playtime where you just shoot up some robots with a badly made story.  I had more content in mind , and a more complex story, but I ain't got enough time to add them all.

Photo sensitive warning, trigger warning, need decent computer to run on
developers: John the game dev and the gamer bundle
